name: 国际残疾人网上科技使用活动日 (GAAD)
#__name_note: International disabled online technology use activity day
#__before_orig: Join us on Thursday May {d}{th}, {y} and mark the {x}th {g}.
before: 欢迎在每年5月份的第三个星期四加入我们，— {g}。
#__before_note: welcome to join us at the third thursday of May every year
#__after_orig: Put next year's {g}, Thursday May {d}{th}, {y}, in your diary. See you then!
after: 请在您的日历上标注5月 日举行的活动日 — {g}。
